original_title: Super Guitar Trio - Live At Montreux
overview: Super Guitar Trio brings together three legends of jazz guitar: Larry Coryell, Al Di Meola & Biréli LagrÃ¨ne. These three virtuoso musicians have collaborated at various times in their career, but this concert from 1989 comes from the only tour they have done together as a trio. They perform a mixture of tracks from each of their solo repertoire plus special arrangements of some of their favorite tracks by other artists. For jazz musicians, playing at Montreux is always a highlight and the three guitarists are clearly inspired by playing together in the unique Montreux atmosphere.
title: Super Guitar Trio - Live At Montreux
